page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content:
BOY-I play 2-Man Hunt where 2 people chase a group of people.Kerby is where two people stand on each side of the road and take turns trying to hit the opposite kerb with a ball.We also play British Bulldogs in which you run from one end to the other,avoiding the catcher in the middle.Once you are caught you help to catch the others.
GIRLS-We play skipping a lot.In summer we organize small Tennis tournaments.Chasey is where one person is HE.Other games are ELASTICS,Cross the Golden River,and T.V. Tig.
